hymn.title: Standing in the evil day (Alternate Tune)

layout.singingstanza: Stand -- ing in the e -- vil day, Heed -- ing not what men may say, Fear -- ing not the face of clay, Christ -- ian sol -- dier, stand.

lyrics.stanza: Standing in the evil day, Heeding not what men may say, Fearing not the face of clay, Christian soldier, stand.
Standing for the Word of God, Standing for the precious blood, Following where the saints have trod, Christian soldier, stand.
Stand 'mid Satan's every wile, Stand 'mid pleasure's wanton smile, Stand when error would beguile; Christian soldier, stand.
Stand till ends life's little day, Stand for Jesus, come what may, Stand and fight and watch and pray; Christian soldier, stand.
